thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 4 of 280
thread.title: D H
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by D H

author: D H
title: D H
text: I made the mistake of looking into refinancing my mortgage, and they have been harassing me ever since. I told the first person that called me that I was not interested, but they have been harassing me for over a week, calling at all hours of the day and night. If I lived in a state where my Attorney General actually worked for taxpayers, I would be reporting them. LEAVE ME ALONE.
